body.name: Utopia Kitchen Saute Fry Pan - Nonstick Frying Pan - 9.5 Inch Induction Bottom - Aluminum Alloy and Scratch Resistant Body - Riveted Handle - Dishwasher Friendly (Black-Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 31 mins
features: The wobble-free bakelite handle is ergonomically designed and riveted strongly to the pan so you can have a safe cooking experience without worrying about the handle getting loose ever
The induction bottom of the frying pan is suitable for all types of cooking; including electric and ceramic cook tops
Formed with multi-layered nonstick and top rated aluminum alloy which is used for highly durable professional grade frying pans
High quality nonstick interior allows for easier cooking and cleanup; PFOA, lead and Cadmium-free

For hand cleaning, first use a paper towel, wooden, or plastic spatula to remove off any loose food from the pan; then use a soft nylon scrubber, sponge, or paper towel sprinkled with a few drops of dish-washing soap to wipe the nonstick surface clean

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Top-Quality Non-Stick Frying Pan! Utopia Kitchen’s frying pan comes with an elegant and modern design which features a durable non-stick coating. It has many other amazing features which makes it a great buy. It is completely safe to use on induction bottoms. It not only helps in preparing food but it also helps you in improving your cooking skills. It features a Bakelite riveted handle which is more than capable of providing a strong and firm grip. You can prepare your favorite fish, vegetables, beef, chicken and many other things with ease. The 4.5 cm height/depth of the frying pan allows you to deep fry your food without any trouble. The non-stick coating provides great ease in the whole cooking process, and you don’t have to worry about the food sticking to the pan’s surface, saving you a tough cleaning process. The induction bottom allows for easier meal preparation as well.

Induction Bottom The induction bottom of the frying pan is suitable for all types of cooking; including electric and ceramic cook tops. The pan is equally suitable if you have the modern glass-top stove or the traditional old school gas burning stove. Care & Maintenance Instructions Wash this pan in warm soapy water and dry it off completely with a soft cotton or linen towel before using it for the first time.To protect the non-stick coating, please use plastic or wooden utensils.Always let the pan to cool down before washing.Unlike standard cookware, nonstick cookware performs better at a slightly lower temperature. A Gift for Foodies This Frying Pan can act as the perfect gift for your loved ones including your friends and family, especially those who are food lovers. You can even gift this to your mom who loves cooking on every occasion whether it’s Christmas, Thanksgiving or just a routine dinner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good pan good price
reviews.reviewText: I just received it the other day and used it several times, good quality, easy to clean and good size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Seems like a decent piece of cookware for a really good price. Best part for me is that it's perfectly flat so works great on smoothtop stoves. Time will tell how well non-stick coating holds up but will try to not use metal utensils with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted!
reviews.reviewText: This 9 1/2” non-stick pan is perfect for what I wanted, scrambled eggs and omelettes. It is recommended that a very high heat is not recommended for this pan, which makes perfect sense. I rubbed a small amount of olive oil in the pan and set the heat dial to halfway down. Scrambling them with a silicone spatula, my eggs came out light, fluffy and perfect. Cleaning up was a breeze. A little soap and water and done. No sticking remnants. I think that with my good care, this pan will last a long time. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It gives five star performance, but…
reviews.reviewText: The enamel the coating on the outside of the pan leaves a lot to be desired. Its not fired correctly or glazed correctly, and eventually the enamel stained the pan itself performs perfectly for what I need it. It’s a well-balanced, gradual heating. Cooks perfectly and washes up beautifully. It should be five star but I gave it four stars because the enameling on the outside is so itchy. I suggest you get it in a dark color rather than the turquoise green. I bought my frying pan, and it shows every little drip and will not come clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Saute Pan is non stick & good quality. Competitive price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, sturdy, and a great cooking surface.
reviews.reviewText: I use cast iron for most things, but I do need a good, non stick pan sometimes. I bought one from the grocery store a few months back for about $20, and it warped in no time, and the cook surface was OK, but still needed to use a lot of butter or oil. I honestly just bought this one because it was only $10, and I needed a new one. When I opened it up I was surprised with the quality. It is solid, and sturdy, with a reinforced bottom with heat distribution. The non stick surface is great, and you hardly need any butter to fry an egg. You really can't go wrong for the price. Next time I need some cookware, I will go with this brand again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great inexpensive pan
reviews.reviewText: This pan is a great middle size. It is lightweight but not too light to feel cheap. The surface is very easy to clean. Husband likes to make his own eggs in the morning and this pan saves on that mess. :-D

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice non stick pan. Thick bottom holds heat. Great handle.

We went through a bunch of pans, including The Rock pans, tfal, and the usual mid range pans... At a lower price than all of those, this pan has remained non-stick far longer than any of those other pans did, and has not scratched, chipped, discoloured, or corroded like the other pans all did. Great buy!

reviews.reviewTitle: Best anti adhesive pan I ever bought
reviews.reviewText: Great all around. Better than anything I bought in stores for over 30 years. Stays scratch free very long.

reviews.reviewTitle: the worst frying pan I ever purchased!!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: purchased this 'non stick' frying pan..........within a month everything I cooked stuck to the 'non' stick surface including bacon. The worst purchase I every made. AVOID AVOID AVOID !!!!!
